title: Ho, My Comrades See The Signal

author.name: Philip P. Bliss
author.bio: Philip P. Bliss was an American composer, conductor, and writer of hymns and gospel songs.

lyrics:
Ho, my comrades
See the signal
Waving in the sky
Reinforcements
Now appearing
Victory is nigh

CHORUS:
Hold the fort
For I am coming
Jesus signals still
Wave the answer
Back to Heaven
By Thy grace we will.

See the mighty
Host advancing
Satan leading on
Mighty men
Around us falling
Courage almost gone.

See the glorious
Banner waving
Hear the trumpet blow
In our leader's name
We'll triumph
Over every foe.

Fierce and long
The battle rages
But our help is near
Onward comes
Our great commander
Cheer, my comrades, cheer.
